title: New Article: "On assessing weaker logical status claims in Wikidata cultural heritage records"
text: This full article has recently been published in Semantic Web Journal (IOS Press), as part of the "Special Issue: Wikidata Construction, Evaluation, and Applications." (Volume 15, Issue 6)

title: KNOT - Rethinking Scholarly Digital Objects as Cultural Heritage
text: Learn more about the KNOT project, a three-year pilot tasked with investigating ways to integrate the digital cultural heritage of Italian universities into the national infrastructure being built by the Central Institute for the Digitization of Cultural Heritage (ICDP) - Digital Library.

title: New Article: "Italo Calvino's ‘destini incrociati’. An experiment of semantic narrative modelling and visualisation"
text: "Italo Calvino's ‘destini incrociati’. An experiment of semantic narrative modelling and visualisation" has been recently published in Umanistica Digitale.

title: Results of the May 13 Wikidata Datathon

title: New article: "OpenCitations Meta"
text: "OpenCitations Meta" has been recently published in Quantitative Science Studies.

title: New article: "Modelling Chinese contemporary calligraphy: the WRITE data model"
text: "Modelling Chinese contemporary calligraphy: the WRITE data model" has been recently published in Digital Scholarship in the Humanities.

title: Vadipac - Digital Valorization of UNIBO's Cultural Heritage
text: Announcing 'Vadipac', a project that aims to survey, digitize, catalog, preserve, and make more easily accessible the cultural heritage preserved in the university's institutions, starting from that of the BUB and other libraries of UNIBO.

title: BolDH — Le Digital Humanities dalla scuola al lavoro' is now on YouTube
text: You can now revive the study day held on 27th September 2023 on the YouTube channel of the Department of Classical Philology and Italian Studies.
